programming: Why do programmers prefer dark mode? Because light attracts bugs! üêõ
Debugging: Removing the needles from the haystack.
I told my computer I needed a break. Now it won't stop sending me Kit-Kats.

crypto: I asked my crypto friend for investment advice. He said 'HODL'... I think he's cold.
What's a cryptocurrency's favorite type of music? Block & roll!
Why did the Bitcoin break up with the Ethereum? It found a better block.
What do you call a cryptocurrency that tells jokes? A laughing stock.
Why did the crypto investor cross the road? To HODL on the other side!
puns: I'm reading a book on anti-gravity. It's impossible to put down!
I told my wife she was drawing her eyebrows too high. She looked surprised.
Why don't scientists trust atoms? Because they make up everything.
I used to be a baker, but I couldn't make enough dough.
